resources.string: Do you really want to create this username?

"Greetings! We're glad to have you here. Here's a simple guide to get started:
" "
" "1. Simply type in your preferred username in the username input field.
" "2. Click on the "Create" button to finalize your username.
" "3. After creating your username, you'll have access to all three buttons, each with unique features.
" "4. To look up a new word, click on the "Agam" button
" "5. For the Word of the Day quiz, click on the "Yuvraj" button.
" "6. To view your saved words, click on the "Muskan" button." "
""That's all there is to it! Enjoy exploring the different features of our page. If you have any inquiries or concerns, please don't hesitate to contact us for assistance."

"Greetings! We're glad to have you here. Here's a simple guide to get started:
" "
" "1. Simply type in your preferred username in the username input field.
" "2. Click on the "Create" button to finalize your username.
" "3. After creating your username, you'll have access to all three buttons, each with unique features.
" "4. To go back to the Home Page "Aman" button
" "5. For the Word of the Day quiz, click on the "Yuvraj" button.
" "6. To view your saved words, click on the "Muskan" button." "
" "That's all there is to it! Enjoy exploring the different features of our page. If you have any inquiries or concerns, please don't hesitate to contact us for assistance."
